definitions.explanation_en: A surname of German origin, commonly found in English-speaking countries; often associated with notable individuals in business, academia, or the arts.
definitions.explanation_cn: 源自德语的姓氏，在英语国家中常见，常与商业、学术或艺术领域的知名人物相关联。
definitions.example_en: The Sachs family has been influential in the development of modern banking in Europe.
definitions.example_cn: 萨克斯家族对欧洲现代银行业的建立产生了重要影响。
